name: Displaced
body:
### Displaced.


[![Game Trailer](http://img.youtube.com/vi/7n_NvM4-vV8/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7n_NvM4-vV8)

Displaced is a free game available for Windows, Linux, and possibly many other platforms (Mac, Android, iOS, etc.).

![Title Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regaldisclaimer/Displaced/master/Images/1.png)


```
You can play this game in your browser, 
or you can download the game on your computer.
No installation required!
```

### Gameplay.

As the game starts, you discover yourself on an unknown distant planet, taking part in a competition to progress through stages as soon as possible

![Breakable Platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regaldisclaimer/Displaced/master/Images/6.png)

```
Controllers are supported, and recommended!
Controllers allow for smoother control of your character.
You can use it on your PC/Linux without any special setup!
```

As you make your way through the stages, you will find diverse and interesting challenges and obstacles.

![Breakable Platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regaldisclaimer/Displaced/master/Images/7.png)

### Start Playing!

We don't want to give away too much spoilers, and would like to recommend you to just start playing the game on your [browser here!]().

![Breakable Platform](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/regaldisclaimer/Displaced/master/Images/9.png)

Lastly, always watch your weight!

```

```
